\n 1. Login to your Heartbeat account\n:
1. Login to your Heartbeat account
  2. On the bottom-left, click on 'Admin Settings'
  3. On the left panel, click on 'API Keys'
  5. Click on 'Create API Key'
  6. On the popup form, Enter the 'Label' to name the Key
  7. Copy the API key and paste it below.
Create a new user in a Heartbeat communi: Create a new user in a Heartbeat community
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Name: Name
The user's email. Must be unique to the: The user's email. Must be unique to the community

A list of the ids of the groups that the: A list of the ids of the groups that the user should belong to.
A Data URI scheme in the JPG, GIF, or PN: A Data URI scheme in the JPG, GIF, or PNG format. Ensure you use the proper content type (image/jpeg, image/png, image/gif) that matches the image data being provided
A link to the user's LinkedIn profile: A link to the user's LinkedIn profile
A link to the user's Twitter profile: A link to the user's Twitter profile
A link to the user's Instagram profile: A link to the user's Instagram profile
If true and a value for bio is provided,: If true and a value for bio is provided, an introduction thread for the user will be created in the channel designated for introductions in your community settings.
